comments:
I20050331-2000

Every single breakpoint hit causes a dialog to appear (see picture) and NPEs
being written to .log (see below). This makes the build fairly unusable for me.

Dani, if you restart your workspace, does the problem go away?

Fixed in JDIObjectValue/JDIDebugTarget. The method #getWaitingThreads() 
returned an array where it was possible to have null entries. Added null check 
while populating waiting threads collection. Also removed duplicate method in 
JDIDebugTarget that searches for model threads corresponding to target threads.
*** Bug 80048 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 85753 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 88855 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
